document_data.mainbody:
Lord Farendrell was an inhabitant of the city of Ravens Bluff in the late 14 century DR.
In Marpenoth of the , the Leylandâ€“Nightstalker wedding took place. Dame Jenilynn Leyland, a Knight of the Right Hand of Tyr, and Sir Sarren Nightstalker, a Knight of the Griffon, were united in a social gala that was reported in the pages of the Ravens Bluff Trumpeter. Lord Farendrell was one of the attendants to the groom, alongside Harker Sorrel and Alexander Thorin. It was reported that the wedding was scheduled for an earlier date, but Jenilynn Leyland was delayed by her mission to the Beastlands and being transformed into a unicorn.
